org.harctoolbox.harchardware.ir

Interface IRawIrSender

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRawIrSenderRepeat
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandFusion, DevLirc, GirsClient, GlobalCache, IrAudioDevice, IrDummy, IrGenericSerial, IrToy, IrTrans, IrTransIRDB, LircCcfClient

    public interface IRawIrSender
    Commands for IR senders being able to send IR signals.

      static int repeatMax
      Max number of repeats to honor

      • getTransmitter

        Transmitter getTransmitter()
        Returns a default Transmitter for the device. May be null if the device ignores the Transmitter argument in sendIr.
